metadata.title: CVE-2022-41723 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A maliciously crafted HTTP/2 stream could cause excessive CPU consumption in the HPACK decoder, sufficient to cause a denial of service from a small number of small requests.

notes.note: alexmurray> google-guest-agent contains a vendored copy of golang-golang-x-net mdeslaur> containerd does not listen on an HTTP/2 endpoint, so not vulnerable. This is fixed in the 20230426.00-0ubuntu packages currently in the -updates pocket, but is not yet fixed in -security

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-net package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
google-guest-agent package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
